flow.name: SRH - Set up default contact fields

actions.text: Welcome to National Family Planning Board (NFPB) Yute Expression Chat, brought to you by U-Report, UNICEF!
Welcome back to National Family Planning Board (NFPB) Yute Expression Chat, brought to you by U-Report, UNICEF!
Before we move on, tell me a little about who I'm speaking to.
Just so you know, this chat is private and confidential. Nothing, including your phone number, is stored and your conversations will not be saved.

Here's some general instructions. Type:
HELLO - any time you want to chat.
BYE - if you ever want to end the chat.
BACK - if you want to go back to a previous menu.
REGISTER_YUTE - if you want to restart the registration process.
COUNSELLOR - if you want to speak directly to the NFPB counsellor.

This platform only recognizes text/numbers 🤭, so please don't send emojis, images, videos or voicenotes.

Ready to chat? Type HELLO 🙂
Heads up!! Are you sure you want to start the registration process again? All your info will be deleted.
Alright.
Sorry, I don't understand what you mean.
How old are you?
Sorry, I don't understand what you mean
Thanks!
Just to let you know, this chatbot is aimed for adolescents between 13 to 24. But of course, you’re still welcome 👋.
Could you tell me the sex you were assigned at birth?
Sorry, I don't understand what you mean. Please select an option from the menu below.
Perfect, thanks!
What PARISH do you live in? Reply with parish name only, like ST ANDREW or HANOVER.
Thank you!
Sorry, we did not understand your answer. Reply with your PARISH name only e.g. ST ANDREW or HANOVER.
Which one of us do you want to talk to?
Hey, I’m Rihanna, or you can call me Riri. I can help with all your sexual and reproductive health questions.
Wah gwan, I’m Sean. We can chat anytime yuh ready.
Hii! I'm Kimmy! Let me help you get di facts on sexual and reproductive health.
Wah gwan, it's Reynaldo. I know all about sexual and reproducitve health. So, you can ask me anything!
Sorry, I don't understand what you mean.
Want to give me your name or a nickname? If not, that’s cool. Just type NO.
Alright, thanks!
Hello, @fields.srh_nickname!
Sorry, I did not get that. Please type your name or nickname in a single message. If you don't want to, that’s cool. Just type NO.

actions.text: Ready to chat? Type HELLO 🙂

YUTE EXPRESSION provides Sexual and Reproductive Health Info for Youth.

Would you like to join?
That's ok! you can always type "REGISTER_YUTE" if you want to join.
